Announcing LCS2 PhD Fellowship

Our lab has an immediate open PhD position in the areas of Natural Language Processing, Social Network Analysis, and Deep Learning.

Eligibility

  • Candidates should have BTech/BE/MTech/MSME/MSc in CS/ECE/IT/EE or related disciplines.
  • Minimum 70% or 7.5 CGPA in UG and PG degree.

Desirable Qualifications

  • Working knowledge of NLP/IR and DL (PyTorch or TensorFlow).
  • Strong in Python programming.

Date of joining

Position will be filled on FCFS basis.

Salary

As per the Govt norm + LCS2 PhD Fellowship (5k-10K per month)

Application Procedure

Interested candidates may upload their updated resume here. Find more details here.

Research Assistant

Our lab is looking for research assistant in the areas of NLP and and Social Network Analysis (Social Computing).

Eligibility

  • BTech/ BE/ MTech/ MS/ ME in CSE/ IT/ ECE/ EE and allied areas.
  • Working knowledge of NLP/IR/Network Science and DL (PyTorch or TensorFlow).
  • Strong in Python programming.

Duration

6 months - 1 year. Extendable based on the performance evaluation at the end of the year

Salary

Salary will vary depending upon the qualification.

Application Procedure

Interested candidates may upload their updated resume here. Find more details here.

Laboratory for Computational Social Systems (LCS2) at Indraprastha Institute of Information Technology, Delhi (IIIT-Delhi)
